verses.content: Chuong hnunga chun vântir- ko dang, thuneina nasatak neiin vâna inthawka hung ṭum ka hmuh a; a ropuinain hnuoi chu a el ta vawng a.

Chun, ama chun rawl inring- takin, “Babulon khaw ropui chu a tlâwm tah, a tlâwm tah! khawhrihai umna le, thlarau inthiengnaw tin- rêng kulbîng le, vate inthiengnaw le tirdakum tinrêng kulbîng a hung ni tah.

A mi dit chîng leia a lunginsenna uoin chu hnam po poin an dâwn ta sih a; hnuoia lalhai chun ama chu an dit hlak a, hnuoia sumdâwngtuhai chun ân hawitir taluotna chu an hausak pha hlak,” tiin a khêk a.
Chun, vâna inthawkin rawl dangin hienghin a hril ka hriet, “Ka mihai, an rîtlonaahai in ṭhangnawna ding le, a hremnahai in hmu ve nawna dingin a sûnga inthawkin suok ro.
A suolnahai chun vân khawm a tawng ta hiel a, Pathienin a thilthaw felnawhai khawm chu a hriet zing sih a.
Amain a pêk ang ngei khan pe thung unla, a thilthawzie ang pei chu a lêt hniin thung unla, a chawkpawl- na noa chun a ta dingin a lêt hniin chawkpawlpêk ro.
“Ân sukropui le ân hawitirzie ang pei khan sawisain suklungngai thung ro; a lungril chun, ‘Lalnuin ka ṭhung a nih, hmeithai hrim ka ni nawh a, lungngaina hmu dêr naw ningah’, a ti sih a.
Chuleiin, ni khat sûngin a hrem- na hri dâm, lungngaina dâm, ṭâm dâm chu–hung tlung vawng a tih; meia rawhmangin um bawk a tih; a rorêltu, Lalpa Pathien chu a hrât sih a.
“Chun, hnuoia lal, a dit hlakhai le ân hawitirpui hlakhai chun, a kâng khu chu an hmu pha a chunga ṭapin âwm inchum an ta;
sawisakna ṭi leia hlataka ngîr- in,Babulon khaw ropui, khaw det chu a chung a rik, a chung a rik! Dârkâr khat chauah i chungah rorêl- na chu a hung tlung ta si,” an tih a.
“Chun, hnuoia sumdâwngtuhai chu a chunga ṭapin an lungngai a, tûkhawma an thuomhnaw an in- châwk ta naw leiin.

An thuomhnawhai chu, rângka- chak dâm, tangka dâm, lungmantam dâm, tuikeplung dâm, puon zai inhmi dâm, puon senduk dâm, tuktulungêk puon dâm, puon sen inlâr dâm leh; thing riminhnik tinrêng dâm, saiha bêl tinrêng dâm, thing hlutak le dâr le thîr le sailungvâra siem, bêl tinrêng dâm leh;

thingzungthak dâm, thil rimin- hnik dâm, riminhnik rawmi dâm, innâlna chi dâm, murra dâm, beraw dâm, uoin dâm, sahriek dâm, beiphit indi tak dâm, bu dâm, sebâwng dâm, berâm dâm leh; sakawr dâm, tawlailîr dâm, suok dâm leh; mihriem hringna dâm leh a nih.
‘Ra i lungrilin a châkhai chun a fe hmang san cheh a, thil tuihnâi le mawi po po chun an bohmang san cheh a, hmu nâwk ta naw tawp an tih,’ an tih a.
“Chuong thila sumdâwngtu, ama leia hung hausahai chu ṭap le lungngai pumin a sawisakna chu ṭi leia hlataka ngîrin,
‘Khaw ropui, puon zai inhmi le puon sen duk le puon sen inlâr sila, rângkachak le lungmantam le tui- keplunga inchei chu, a chung a rik, a chung a rik!
Dârkâr khat chauah sum chuong zozai chu teplo a lo ni ta hi,’ tîng an tih.

“Chun, lawng hotu taphawt dâm, lawnga fe hlak taphawt dâm, lawng mi dâm, tuisuorieta sinthaw taphawt dâm chu hlataka ngîrin, a kâng khu chu thlîr pumin, ‘Hi khaw ropui tluk hi khâwlai khuo am um a ta?’ tiin an khêk a.

Chun, ṭap le lungngai pumin, ‘A muk leia tuisuorieta lawng neituhai hausakna khaw ropui chu, a chung a rik ie, a chung a rik ie! Dârkâr khat chauah teplo a hung ni ta hi!’ tia khêkin an luah pilvutin an theh a.
“Aw vân le nangni mi in- thienghai, tirkohai dâm, zâwlneihai dâm, lâwm ro, ama chun in chunga ro a rêlna chun Pathienin a chungah ro a rêl ve ta hi,” tiin.

Chun, vântirko hrâttak hin burawtnawina lung lientak ang hi lung a lâk a, tuisuorietah a peithlâk a, “Babulon khaw ropui chu hieng anga nasa hin peithlâk nîng a tih, tûkhawmin hmu nâwk ta naw tawp an tih.

Ṭingṭang keituhai dâm, ieng- khat mût thiemhai dâm, theihle mûttuhai dâm, tawtawrâwt puhai ri dâm i sûngah hre nâwk ta naw tawp an ta; themthiem kawng hrim hrim- ah themthiem hrim khawm i sûngah hmu nâwk ta naw tawp an ta; burawtnawina ri khawm i sûngah hre nâwk ta naw tawp an tih.
Khâwnvar khawm i sûngah var nâwk ta naw tawp a ta; pasal le mo ri khawm i sûngah hre nâwk ta naw tawp an tih. I sumdâwngtuhai chu hnuoia mi lienhai an ni sih a; i dâwiin hnam po po hlêm an ni kha.
A sûngah zâwlneihai dâm, mi inthienghai dâm, hnuoia that po pohai thisen dâm chu an hmuh a,” a tih a.
